{{cpp/title|layout_right}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=mdspan|since=c++23|
struct layout_right;
}}

{{tt|layout_right}} is a {{named req|LayoutMappingPolicy}} which provides a layout mapping where the rightmost extent has stride 1, and strides increase right-to-left as the product of extents.

{{rev begin}}
{{rev|until=c++26|
{{tt|layout_right}} is a {{named req|TrivialType}}.
}}
{{rev|since=c++26|
{{tt|layout_right}} is {{named req|TriviallyCopyable}}, and {{c|std::is_trivially_default_constructible_v&lt;layout_right&gt;}} is {{c|true}}.
}}
{{rev end}}

It is the default layout mapping policy used by {{lc|std::mdspan}} if no user-specified layout is provided.
